data.name: LicenseExpiredMessage
data.value: Your Optiviera ERP license has expired. To continue using the application, you need to purchase a new license or renew your existing license.

data.name: PurchaseNewLicenseDescription
data.value: Purchase the full version of Optiviera ERP to access all features.

data.name: ActivateExistingLicenseDescription
data.value: If you already have a license key, you can activate it here.

data.name: ContactSupport
data.value: If you need assistance with licensing, please contact our support team.
